# isSessionOnly

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the cookie should be discarded at the end of the session (regardless of expiration date).

## Declaration

```swift
var isSessionOnly: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

This value is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if the cookie should be discarded at the end of the session (regardless of expiration date), otherwise [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

## Determining cookie lifespan

- **expiresDate**: The cookie’s expiration date.
title: isSessionOnly
